title: Strange Ping locking bug spawning in
body:
**HELP**
Ever since A couple patches ago, my game has been having this strange issue with ping at the start of nearly all of my games which force me to alt f4 roughly when minions spawn, This leaves me unreliable during invades and potentially miss half a wave. 

The issue specifically is something to do with ping spikes, it renders my controls useless. the only temp fix is alt f4 but I want something more permanent, leaving nearly every game just to play isn't fun.
